text: @Konservativer 🇩🇪💡🔌🇷🇺Pre-tax electricity and gas prices in Europe have soared since Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, but are now declining. Who has the priciest electricity and gas in Europe? 🤔Highest electricity prices:🏆1. Denmark (€28.7 per 100 kWh)🏆2. Germany (€27.6 per 100 kWh)🏆3. Belgium (€26.5 per 100 kWh)Lowest electricity prices:🏁1. North Macedonia (€10.4 per 100 kWh)🏁2. Bosnia and Herzegovina (€5.9 per 100 kWh)Highest natural gas prices:🏆1. Netherlands (€13.7 per 100 kWh)🏆2. Germany (€13.4 per 100 kWh)🏆3. Belgium (€13.1 per 100 kWh)Lowest natural gas prices:🏁1. North Macedonia (€10.4 per 100 kWh)🏁2. Bosnia and Herzegovina (€5.9 per 100 kWh)EU natural gas imports from Russia made up almost 50% of the total before the war. 💡🇷🇺
